about_me_tag: Crafting digital experiences with code & creativity
about_me_desc_1: I'm a full-stack developer who loves to blend in both design and technology, with a particular interest in frontend work. I enjoy creating thoughtful, user-friendly experiences that combine form and function.
about_me_desc_2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading, painting—whether with watercolors or digitally—and crocheting. I’ve always been passionate about creating and expressing ideas through different forms.
